actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Reserved Water. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands by exchange at Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in the State of Indiana, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire from the State of Indiana lands known as the Heron Rookery at the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in exchange for lands known as the Hoosier Prairie at the lakeshore.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire certain lands by exchange at Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore in the State of Indiana, and for other purposes.
